== Kunnathunad (CT) (627962) ==

Kunnathunad (CT) is a town in the [[Kunnathunad]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 17.21 sq. km. and harbouring 5377 households with total population of 22881 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 250 km. Male population is 11360 and female population is 11521. Scheduled Caste population is 4108 and Scheduled Tribes population is 61. Census Location Code of the town is 627962<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 15 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 15 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam at a distance of 15 km.
